instruction: Describe a situation in which learning new skills can be beneficial
output: Learning new skills can be beneficial in many situations. For example, if someone wants to advance in their career, they will need to learn new skills to stay competitive. This can also be beneficial when looking for a new job, as employers are sometimes more likely to hire someone with new skills. Additionally, being able to learn new skills can make someone more adaptable to changes in their field and the marketplace.
